ygData.subject: Re: Seeking Level 11-12 party for Befallen
ygData.msgSnippet: Nay mate, you don t wanna go at nine that place is RUTHLESS.  The single creatures aren t bad but they tend to come in trains... i ve seen 4 necromancer
ygData.messageBody:
Nay mate, you don't wanna go at nine that place is RUTHLESS. The single
creatures aren't bad but they tend to come in trains... i've seen 4
necromancer acolyte's, 2 neophytes, 1 normal necro, half a dozen pets+,
two greater skeletons, 1 lesser mummy and a ghoul show up when you pulled
one creature with a dagger in the hall right beside the enterance... i
avoid that pit until i'm near level 14-16... (on the bright side corpse
retreival is easy =) ) Befallen is in the West commonlands... head out of
the Newbie gate at freeport and go through east commonlands on the left
hand wall... stay on wall in west commonlands until you see a hut, then
start looking down towards the base of the wall ... if its night you'll
see the big glowing maw of befallen... day times just look for a hole int
he ground... luck.

Shads

On Thu, 20 May 1999, Dave Aylesbury wrote:

> From: "Dave Aylesbury" <daylesbury@...>
>
> If you could tolerate a 9th level Dwarf bonehead(warrior), I would be happy
> to go with you guys.... uhhhh where's befallen?
> Rugga
>
> ----Original Message Follows----
> From: Doc Lotus <doclotus@...>
> Reply-To: Bristlebane_EQ@onelist.com
> To: Bristlebane_EQ_OOC@onelist.com
> CC: Bristlebane_EQ@onelist.com
> Subject: [Bristlebane_EQ] Seeking Level 11-12 party for Befallen
> Date: Thu, 20 May 1999 08:28:34 -0700 (PDT)
>
> From: Doc Lotus <doclotus@...>
>
> Hi everyone,
>
> Its your friendly neighborhood cleric, Vrachit again. I am looking for
> a few adventuring souls of level 11-12 (13 is ok, but preferably not a
> lot of folks cause I like equal ep distribution) distinction to hunt in
> befallen level 2 with me. An additional cleric would be cool as 1 could
> heal while 1 wards and certain need a tank or two. Mages and bards are
> nice as well.
>
> Befallen doesn't have to be where we hunt but its a good dungeon and
> doesn't seem too overcrowded even at peak times. If you have other
> suggested places I'm certainly open to them.
>
> You can either reply to the list or send me an email. I typically play
> in the evenings betweek 8pm and 12am eastern time.
>
> Let me know if you wanna have some fun!
>
> Vrachit, virgo with venus rising <g>
>
> ps, is this the beginning of EQ personal ads? <g>
